comments.content:
That McCain guy is so hip he uses a font randomizer to make subliminal attack ads. Wow, and they say he is an old, out-of-touch, geezer :-)  
What would expect from an outfit named “Foxhole Studios”?

ChrisL

Out of touch ?! Not for a second. It is not just the low game they play ( [http://www.newyorker.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013191336/http:/www.newyorker.com/ "http://www.newyorker.com/") ) but, also let’s not forget that the machines are already in place ...

Cross your fingers ...
